pydocstyle.option:
Type: PydocstyleOptions/null
Status: DEPRECATED

Available Sub-options:
  - convention: Whether to use Google-style, NumPy-style conventions, or the [PEP 257](https://peps.python.org/pep-0257/)
  - ignore-decorators: Ignore docstrings for functions or methods decorated with the
  - ignore-var-parameters: If set to `true`, ignore missing documentation for `*args` and `**kwargs` parameters.
